title: Avoid False Prophets and Idolatry
summary: Deuteronomy 13 warns against false prophets, even if their signs come true, if they lead people away from God. Idolatry, even from close family members or whole towns, must be dealt with severely to protect the communityâ€™s faithfulness.

faq.question: What should be done with a false prophet?
faq.answer: They must be put to death if they lead people to worship other gods.

faq.question: How serious was the call to avoid idolatry?
faq.answer: Even close family members were not to be spared if they led others into idolatry.
